scripts.test: npm run test4 && npm run test5 && npm run test6
scripts.test4: set -e; for FILE in test/*.js; do echo --- $FILE - mongodb v4 ---; node $FILE 4; done
scripts.test5: set -e; for FILE in test/*.js; do echo --- $FILE - mongodb v5 ---; node $FILE 5; done
scripts.test6: set -e; for FILE in test/*.js; do echo --- $FILE - mongodb v6 ---; node $FILE 6; done
